Package ch.pschatzmann.news

Class HistoryDataNYT

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.pschatzmann.news.HistoryDataNYT
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IData

    public class HistoryDataNYT
extends java.lang.Object
implements IData
    Loads the headlines form the New York Times with the help of the archive API into Solr
    Author:
    pschatzmann
